name: advanced-javascript-concepts-series-discussion-2025
author: Gene Tigner
description: A series of advances javascript concepts for discussion in The Association for Computing Machinery (ACM) 2025. This program is a list of some examples of Advanced JavaScript Concepts. At the time of this writing I am considering the following 3 categories for each discussion across three days. Day 1: Array Methods, Day 2: Object Methods and Complex Objects, Day 3: Functions and Higher Order Functions. There should be enough information on each of these topics in order to be able to talk about them at length.
